A

addMonitor(ICMonitor) - Method in DefaultMessagePump
addMonitor(ICMonitor) - Method in ICMessagePump
Used by the framework to add a monitor object to the list of monitors that will receive events during a transformation.

C

checkRequiredConfigItems(GPathResult, List<String>) - Method in Utilities
Accepts a GPathResult and a List of Strings.
Conduit - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
This class is the embodiment of a single data transformation.
ConduitException - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ConduitException is the base class for any exceptions thrown by the framework during a transformation.
ConduitException(String) - Constructor in ConduitException
ConduitFactory - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ConduitFactory class constructs instances of Conduit objects when supplied with GPathConfig objects containing their configuration settings.
ConfigurationException - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
A ConfigurationException is thrown by the framework if there is a problem reading the XML configuration file or setting properties on source, sink, or monitor objects.
ConfigurationException(String, String) - Constructor in ConfigurationException
ConsoleMonitor - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit.monitors
The ConsoleMonitor publishes events generated by sources or sinks during the transformation to the Console.
createConduit(GPathResult) - Method in ConduitFactory
CSVFileSink - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit.sinks

D

DefaultMessagePump - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The DefaultMessagePump class is a simple implementation of the ICMessagePump interface.

H

I

ICFitting - Interface in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ICFitting interface is the superinterface for all source, sink, and monitor components in the Conduit framework
ICMessagePump - Interface in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ICMessagePump interface is implemented by a class that distributes events from the source and sink objects to the monitor objects.
ICMonitor - Interface in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ICMonitor interface is implemented by any classes that will observe the events generated by the source and sink components and display or persist them.
ICSink - Interface in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ICSink interface is implemented by any classes that write data to a destination.
ICSource - Interface in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The ICSource interface is implemented by any classes that read data from a source.
iterateOverRows(String, Closure, int, ICMessagePump) - Method in OracleSqlStatementSource
iterateOverRows(String, Closure, int, ICMessagePump) - Method in SqliteSqlStatementSource
iterateWithRowCount(List, Closure) - Method in Utilities
Accepts a List of data and a closure that implements some work to perform on the List.

Method called by source and sink objects during a transformation.
logEvent(ICFitting, Map) - Method in ICMonitor
Called by the messagePump object during transformations to distribute events logged by the source and sink objects.
logEvent(ICFitting, Map) - Method in LogFileMonitor
LogFileMonitor - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit.monitors
The LogFileMonitor class publishes events generated by sources or sinks during a transformation to a log file.

M

Main - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit
The Main class contains the entry point invoked by java -jar Conduit.jar conduits.xml.

N

NullSink - Class in edu.richmond.adminsys.conduit.sinks
The NullSink is a sink class intended to do nothing during a transformation.
